name: vsc-git-info
description: A VSCode extension for getting information from git

gitInfo.statusBarMessageDisplayLeft.description: Display status bar message to the left

gitInfo.statusBarPositionPriority.description: Priority where the status bar view should be placed

gitInfo.statusBarMessageFormat.description: Customize the standard status bar message

gitInfo.statusBarMessageNoFileOpened.description: Customize the standard status bar message for when no file is opened

gitInfo.statusBarMessageNoRepo.description: Customize the status bar message for when no repository was found

gitInfo.statusBarMessageIgnoredFile.description: Customize the status bar message for when the current file is being ignored

gitInfo.statusBarMessageNoCommit.description: Customize the status bar message for when the changes are not yet committed

gitInfo.statusBarMessageNoInfoFound.description: Customize the status bar message for when no git info was found

gitInfo.statusBarMessageLoading.description: Customize the status bar message for when the extension is loading
